main

Class VehicleImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.VehicleImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Vehicle

    public class VehicleImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vehicle
    Simulated vehicle. This implementation only computes new locations when the state is requested or the moving direction is updated.
